main event: An observer in Tangent, Oregon reported seeing a red glow on the horizon, which later appeared to move toward him and disappear straight up.
interesting points: The object seemed to spread out and become diffused when it returned., The observer initially believed the location might be a refractor in the sky., The object hovered about 150 feet off the ground and was described as round and silver in color., The sighting lasted several minutes before the object suddenly disappeared., Two witnesses were present during the sighting.
sighted object: a round, silver saucer-like object and a red glow
witness description: the main observer and a girl friend who was with him
